title: Approval; when deemed effective
context: ยง431:2-202.5 Approval; when deemed effective. Except as provided otherwise, any approval required by law shall be deemed granted on the sixtieth calendar day following the filing of the request for approval if the commissioner does not take any affirmative action to grant or deny the approval within sixty calendar days of the request. [L 2000, c 264, ยง1; am L 2001, c 121, ยง1; am L 2011, c 81, ยง2]
